conclusion: Need to analyze the velocity-time graph to determine acceleration.
At t = 1 second, the velocity is v1 = 2 m/s.
At t = 3 seconds, the velocity is v3 = -2 m/s.
The change in velocity Δv is given by Δv = v3 - v1.
The time interval Δt is t3 - t1 = 3 - 1 = 2 seconds.
Acceleration a is given by a = Δv/Δt.
The acceleration of the particle during the time interval from 1 to 3 seconds is -2 m/s².
